SELECT REQ.REQUEST_NO, PRJ.PRJCT_NM, EMP.EMPL_NM, EQ.EQPMN_NM, REQ.RENTAL_START_DATE, REQ.RENTAL_END_DATE, REQ.REQUEST_DATE, REQ.APPROVAL_STATUS FROM TB_EQUIPMENT_ARRANGEMENT_REQUEST REQ JOIN TB_PROJECT PRJ ON REQ.PRJCT_NO = PRJ.PRJCT_NO JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE EMP ON REQ.EMPL_CODE = EMP.EMPL_CODE JOIN TB_EQUIPMENT EQ ON REQ.EQPMN_NO = EQ.EQPMN_NO WHERE 1=1
AND PRJ.PRJCT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND EMP.EMPL_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND EQ.EQPMN_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND REQ.APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus}
ORDER BY REQ.REQUEST_DATE DESC

SELECT REQ.REQUEST_NO, REQ.PRJCT_NO, PRJ.PRJCT_NM, PRJ.PRJCT_LC, REQ.EMPL_CODE, EMP.EMPL_NM, EQ.EQPMN_NO, EQ.EQPMN_NM, EQ.EQPMN_TY, EQ.EQPMN_SN, EQ.MAKR_NM, REQ.REQUEST_DATE, REQ.APPROVAL_STATUS, REQ.RENTAL_START_DATE, REQ.RENTAL_END_DATE FROM TB_EQUIPMENT_ARRANGEMENT_REQUEST REQ JOIN TB_PROJECT PRJ ON REQ.PRJCT_NO = PRJ.PRJCT_NO JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE EMP ON REQ.EMPL_CODE = EMP.EMPL_CODE JOIN TB_EQUIPMENT EQ ON REQ.EQPMN_NO = EQ.EQPMN_NO WHERE REQ.APPROVAL_STATUS IN ('D', 'Y', 'N') ORDER BY REQ.REQUEST_DATE DESC

SELECT REQ.REQUEST_NO, REQ.PRJCT_NO, PRJ.PRJCT_NM, PRJ.PRJCT_LC, REQ.EMPL_CODE, EMP.EMPL_NM, EQ.EQPMN_NO, EQ.EQPMN_NM, EQ.EQPMN_TY, EQ.EQPMN_SN, EQ.MAKR_NM, REQ.REQUEST_DATE, REQ.APPROVAL_STATUS, REQ.RENTAL_START_DATE, REQ.RENTAL_END_DATE, REQ.ARRANGEMENT_REASON FROM TB_EQUIPMENT_ARRANGEMENT_REQUEST REQ JOIN TB_PROJECT PRJ ON REQ.PRJCT_NO = PRJ.PRJCT_NO JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE EMP ON REQ.EMPL_CODE = EMP.EMPL_CODE JOIN TB_EQUIPMENT EQ ON REQ.EQPMN_NO = EQ.EQPMN_NO WHERE REQ.REQUEST_NO = #{requestNo}
SELECT PRJCT_NO, PRJCT_NM, PRJCT_LC FROM TB_PROJECT WHERE PRJCT_NO LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR PRJCT_NM LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT a.empl_code AS emplCode, a.empl_nm AS emplNm, a.dept_code AS deptCode, b.dept_nm AS deptNm, a.clsf_code AS clsfCode, c.code_nm AS clsfNm FROM TB_EMPLOYEE a JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT b ON a.dept_code = b.dept_code JOIN TB_COMMONNESS_CODE c ON a.clsf_code = c.code AND c.group_code = 'RANK' WHERE a.hffc_sttus = '01' AND (a.empl_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR b.dept_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR c.code_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY b.dept_code, c.code_nm, a.empl_nm
